content.raw: I noticed it isn't possible to build this plugin by itself. I don't think it's necessary for this PR, but we could keep in mind to add an example of a plugin which is its own cmake project later, as a reference for users. For example, Gazebo has an [examples/plugins](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/4e250e782cf04f70d2db6ad885a59bf6186691af/examples/plugins/?at=default) directory where each plugin can be built individually.
content.html: I noticed it isn't possible to build this plugin by itself. I don't think it's necessary for this PR, but we could keep in mind to add an example of a plugin which is its own cmake project later, as a reference for users. For example, Gazebo has an examples/plugins directory where each plugin can be built individually.
